name: stretchy-spaces
description: Allows you to change how wide your spaces are.

stretchySpaces.targetIndentation.description: How many spaces do you wish your indentation was? Default is 4. Must be 0 or above.

stretchySpaces.includedLanguages.description: For which languages indent-rainbow should be activated. When empty will use for all languages.

stretchySpaces.excludedLanguages.description: For which languages indent-rainbow should be deactivated. When left empty will ignore.

stretchySpaces.updateDelay.description: The delay in ms until the editor gets updated.
